sentences.sContent: I guess, compared with most of them, we were.
sentences.sContent_eng: I guess, compared with most of them, we were.
sentences.sCn: 我想，和他们多数人相比，我们是很富有。

sentences.sContent: Our greenhouse is nothing compared with yours.
sentences.sCn: 我们这个温室比起你们那个简直是小巫见大巫。

sentences.sContent: Each alternative from each policy is compared with every alternative from the other.
sentences.sContent_eng: Each alternative from each policy is compared with every alternative from the other.
sentences.sCn: 策略中的每个替代与另一个策略中的每个替代都进行比较。
